doc.field: Leake and Watts Children's Home records
Leake and Watts Children's Home records
Series I - Leake and Watts Orphan House in the City of New York/Leake and Watts Children's Home, Inc.
Series I - Leake and Watts Orphan House in the City of New York/Leake and Watts Children's Home, Inc.

The series contains records of the Leake and Watts Orphan House/Leake and Watts Children's Home, arranged in ten subseries, as follows: Subseries I.1 - Minutes, 1831-1949 Subseries I.2 - Reports, 1844-1949 Subseries I.3 - Administrative Records, 1816-1949 Subseries I.4 - Numbered Files from the Office of William A. Kirk,circa 1918-1965 Subseries I.5 - Financial Records, 1833-1957 Subseries I.6 - Records of Children, Clubs and Activities Subseries I.7 - Real Estate Records Subseries I.8 - Printed Materials Subseries I.9 - Visual Materials Subseries I.10 - Clippings
The series contains records of the Leake and Watts Orphan House/Leake and Watts Children's Home, arranged in ten subseries, as follows:
